doc.field: Jerry and Sandra Sanders Simelson Collection on New York University
Jerry and Sandra Sanders Simelson Collection on New York University

Jerry Simelson graduated from New York University's School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance (now the Stern School of Business) in 1956. Sandra Lee graduated from the School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance in 1959 and the School of Social Work in 1989. The Jerry and Sandra Sanders Simelson Collection on New York University (dated 1954-1957) consists of photographs, certificates, and ephemera relatied to the tenure of Jerry Simelson and Sandra Lee Simelson at New York University's School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance (now Stern). The majority of the ephemera documents dances, including the Prom and Varsity Drag, and student organizations the Simelson's participated in, including the Finance Society, the Interclub Council, and Sigma Eta Phi.

Jerry Simelson graduated from New York University's School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance (now the Stern School of Business) in 1956. Sandra Lee graduated from the School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance in 1959 and the School of Social Work in 1989.
Donated by Nina Kaplan, Jerry and Sandra Sanders Simelson's daughter, in April 2023; the accession number associated with this gift is 2023.042.
